channel.title: Congratulations to our newest sectional moderator: The Soul
channel.description:
Congratulations to [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=287018]The Soul[/url] on becoming our newest moderator!
He will be moderating the Server Help and the Server Downloads boards.
-Moparscape moderation team
